overview: In Elder Blue: Chapters 1-4, Elder Blue is summoned by President Skye for a serious meeting where he is reprimanded for having a tattoo. Elder Blue tried to hide it, but now President Skye has to teach him how important it is to follow the dress code. During a meeting with President Skye, Elder Blue reveals that he's been having impure thoughts and touching himself. President Skye tells him it is not for him to forgive, but he must make sure he's been masturbating right, so he urges him to show him how he pleases himself.  In Elder Blue: Chapters 1-4, Elder Blue has been doing so well within the order that he will get President Skye's anointing massage. President Skye has a significant interview with Elder Blue, in which he has to ensure the young man feels completely comfortable with his role and duties within the organization. To President Skye's surprise, Elder Blue passed his test with flying colors, and now the older man is happy to reward his young acolyte.
title: Elder Blue: Chapters 1-4
